clean_dishwasher_body.description: Clean the dishwasher body to remove grime and debris.

clean_shelf.description: Clean the shelf inside the dishwasher to keep hygiene maintenance.

press_shelf.description: Press the shelf to ensure it's firmly attached.

clean_whole_dishwasher.description: Clean the entire dishwasher including the dishwasher body and the shelf.

inspect_dishwasher.description: Inspect the entire dishwasher by touching every part for checking.
